name: claude-task-runner
description: Decompose complex tasks into executable sub-tasks with parallel execution, independent verification, and comprehensive reporting
author: Matthew O'Riordan

commands.name: tasks-plan
commands.description: Plan tasks from a brief - interactive task decomposition

commands.name: tasks-run
commands.description: Execute tasks with smart parallelization and verification

commands.name: tasks-status
commands.description: Show detailed status of a task-runner project

commands.name: tasks-projects
commands.description: List all task-runner projects with summary status

commands.name: tasks-quick
commands.description: Quick task execution from a simple prompt - auto-generates brief and tasks

agents.name: task-executor
agents.description: Execute a single task in isolation. Returns DONE, PARTIAL, or STUCK.

agents.name: task-verifier
agents.description: Verify a task was completed correctly. Returns PASS or FAIL.
